name: Bunny Pop
description:
Bunny Pop is a super fun & highly addictive bubble pop game that’ll keep you playing for hours!

Join Bunny on a colorful bubble shooting forest adventure bursting with a number of challenges!
The wicked wolves have captured the poor baby bunnies! Fire your bubbly cannon to defeat the wolves and release the adorable baby bunnies.


Your efforts will be rewarded, so hop to it and bubble shoot your way to victory!

HOW TO PLAY
• Aim carefully and tap where you want to throw!
• Match 3 or more same-colored bubbles to make them pop!
• Special boosters & items to help you pass trickier levels.
• Pop all the bubbles with minimal shots to score higher.
• No rush! There are no time limits.



FEATURES
• Shoot as many bubbles as you can!

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 200 levels with uniquely amazing challenges!
- Explore the beautiful bright world with Bunny!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master

• 7 Day Events!
- Earn daily rewards to help you out!

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Play anytime, anywhere!

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- Enjoy the game offline.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing soundtrack and gorgeous visual effects

• OPTIMIZED ANDROID & GOOGLE PLAY GAMES
- Designed for tablets & phones.
- Support both ARM & x86 DEVICES.

NOTES
• Bunny Pop contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Bunny Pop is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins.

E-MAIL
• help@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE
• https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6249013288401661340

Like us on FACEBOOK
• https://www.facebook.com/BitMangoGames

App Permissions

[Required Permissions]
- None

[Optional Permissions]
- Photo / Media / File: required storage access permission to save game data

[Permission setting and withdrawal method]
- Android 6.0+: Device Settings> Application Management> Select App> Revoke Access
- Under Android 6.0: Can revoke access by deleting application

Time to pop!
Thank you!
